answers.answer: I was about to post the same question i have my appointment tomorrow to
I had the clear one.i want to say it was lemon of something but it taste like sprite.
I had orange and the lab lady told me its nastier when its warm. but my dr gave me mine so I took it home and put it in the refrigerator
I had the one that tastes like sprite too. The first few sips are ok. But you really have to force yourself to drink the last bit. Bleehh
I had orange. It tasted like a really sweet flat orange soda. The lab where I did it kept them in a fridge so it was nice and cold.
Orange is better. Drink it when its cold. It taste like off brand flat pop .
I had a cold fruit punch and it wasn't bad at all! My sister had the orange flavor and couldn't keep it down which really scared me going into the test
I had the fruit punch and asked the lady what one tasted best she said most like the fruit punch and that's what I had and it litteraly taste just like fruit punch I liked it
Fruit punch especially when its cold it taste like sugary kool_aid . I also had orange gross!
Yes the fruit punch is the best lol
Mines in two weeks I have the drink in the fridge right now lol. My friend that took the same exact one said it was really good.
I had the lemon lime on cold it wasn't bad just extremely sugary but I managed to keep it down

question: have the appt tomorrow to drink that nasty stuff , for the pregnancy diabetes . What flavor do yall prefer ?
title: Flavors !!
